Class PersistenceManager

java.lang.Object
game.PersistenceManager
public class PersistenceManager extends Object
Handles saving and loading game progress to and from disk.

The PersistenceManager class provides methods to:

  • Save a Battle object to a file
  • Load a saved Battle from a file
  • List all available saved battles
Saves are stored in the saves/ directory using binary serialization.

  • Method Details

    • saveBattle

      public static void saveBattle(Battle battle, String battleName)
      Saves a Battle object to disk using the specified name. Creates the saves/ directory if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      battle - the battle instance to save
      battleName - the name of the save file (without extension)

    • loadBattle

      public static Battle loadBattle(String battleName)
      Loads a saved Battle object from disk.
      Parameters:
      battleName - the name of the save file (with extension)
      Returns:
      the loaded Battle object, or null if loading fails

    • listSavedBattles

      public static ArrayList<String> listSavedBattles()
      Lists all saved battle files in the saves/ directory. Filters out system files like .DS_Store.
      Returns:
      a list of save file names
